(AP Photo/Luca Bruno) DOHA, Qatar (AP) ' Luis Enrique was replaced by Luis de la Fuente as Spain's coach on Thursday, two days after the national team was eliminated in the round of 16 at the World Cup.

Other candidates who had been considered besides De la Fuente, who was Spain's under-21 coach, included former Belgium manager Roberto Mart'nez and former Athletic Bilbao coach Marcelino Garc'a Toral.

reused_details.reused: Spain Under-21s head coach, Luis de la Fuente, has been appointed as Luis Enrique's replacement.
reused_by_aic: DOHA, Qatar (AP) ' Luis Enrique was replaced by Luis de la Fuente as Spain's coach on Thursday, two days after the national team was eliminated in the round of 16 at the World Cup .

(AP Photo/Luca Bruno) DOHA, Qatar (AP) ' Luis Enrique was replaced by Luis de la Fuente as Spain's coach on Thursday, two days after the national team was eliminated in the round of 16 at the World Cup.

Other candidates who had been considered besides De la Fuente, who was Spain's under-21 coach, included former Belgium manager Roberto Mart'nez and former Athletic Bilbao coach Marcelino Garc'a Toral.
De la Fuente is expected to make his debut with the senior team when Spain resumes playing in qualifying for Euro 2024 in March next year.

reused_details.reused: 'The sports management of the RFEF has transferred to the president a report in which it is determined that a new project should start for the Spanish Soccer Team, with the aim of continuing with the growth achieved in recent years thanks to the work carried out by Luis Enrique and their collaborators.
reused_by_aic: The Spanish soccer federation thanked Luis Enrique, but said it was time to 'start a new project' to keep the growth achieved by the coach in recent years.

reused_details.reused: The coach earns the love and admiration of his collaborators in the national team and of the entire Federation, which will always be his home.'
reused_by_aic: 'It was very special to be part of this.' He also thanked fans and called for their support to the new coach.
